overview: The end of the world predicted by the Maya is not coming as expected, but the people seems to have lost the memory of their loved ones. Li Hui tries to find her beloved, a man who follows her like a shadow appears. A Liang, played by You-Ning Yang, is a professional killer, and Li Hui is his target. However, the two have a mutual affection.  Part of the short-films series "美好2012之勇敢愛"
title: Journey of Love
